PropertyList.title: Lockheed Martin F-22A Raptor V0.89

key.name: w
key.desc: Switch the weapon type between guns and missiles

key.name: l (Lower-case L)
key.desc: Fire the current selected counter messure program

key.name: Shift-T
key.desc: Toggle the FBW Override switch (0 is off 1 is on)

key.name: t
key.desc: Radar cursor / Select and Lock highlighted target

key.name: q
key.desc: Reset to default view direction (works on all but pilot cam)

key.name: m
key.desc: Select an Air to Air Weapon

key.name: n
key.desc: Select an Air to Ground Weapon

key.name: y
key.desc: Lock on to the Next Target

PropertyList.line: Lockheed Martin F-22A
Ceiling 65000ft
Maximum speed: Mach 2.25 @ 40000ft: Mach 1.8+ @ sea level
Super Cruise speed: Mach 1.30 40000ft Mil Thrust
Maximum AOA: 70 Degreese
AGP-77 AESA Radar Specifications:------------------
Maximum Range: 320 Nautical Miles
Maximum Azimuth 270 (In SLR Mode) 120 in RWS
TWS: Azimuth: 65, Speed: Normal, Range: 5-160
RWS: Azimuth: 120, Speed: Normal, Range: 5-320
ACM: Azimuth: 65, Speed: Fast, Range: 5-160, HUD Lockable
SLR: Azimuth: 270, Speed: Normal, Range: 5-320, Aid with Side Looking Radars
To turn on the Radar HUD, Press the switch on the lower right console that is labled power.
You will know its on when the green light just below the switch turns on, (You may have to press it twice when you spawn in)
To Start Raptor: Simply click the battery switch till its at main power (Twice) then Press the 2 JFS switches on the bottom left console. Then press the 2 cutoff switches.
Next switch the 6 switches on the Electrical panel to turn on instruments, flight controls, Counter messures, and more. then click the POWER switch on the HUD panel to turn on the canvas hud
Rotate around 185 With auto flaps
When the Gear is down, The Vectors will Lock up to the center position and stay in place to ease takeoffs and landings
The small left screen will show you flight data like aoa, and flaps setting (more coming soon)
The vectors go up +-30 degrees at max. The FBW will automaticly adjust the min and max according to your speed. You can disable the limiter with the FBW override switch
But it will only adjust it by +-10 degrees
You can turn OFF the vectors entirely with The vector shutoff switch. it is located on the lower right console
The FBW Will automaticly move the flaps into the most effective position when the gear is down.
Manuel control of the flaps is available when the gear is up
The FBW override switch disables the automatic flaps and allows you to control them no matter the gear possition
RWR terminology: When you here 3 beeps: New Threat Deteced. When you here 1 beep: Redected threat.
When you here Repeated delayed beeps: a bandit is locked on you. When you hear repeated quick beeps Missile inbound! Missile will show on RWR
The 3 buttons with right arrows disable the autopilot feature displayed in text to the right of the button Press Ctrl-c and youll see it
Text will light up on the front panel showing which feature is active
Use the VS, ASI Up Down Rocker buttons to the right of the text panel to change the rates of the autopilot
For heading: Wing leveler is only inplemented at the moment.
We like to constantly add alot of new cool things to Raptor! (At bare minimum, One update / week) If you like this jet: Update it here! https://github.com/racerretrocoder/Flightgear-F-22A-Raptor
We hope you Love flying this jet! :D
P.S. If you need help, Or want to submit a custom livery, Come join my discord temporily (Or stay up to you) server! (Check the link at the bottom of the github repo or readme.md file)
